title: I feel like Silver players are worse than Bronze players
body:
I did poorly in my placements on my new smurf and ended up in Silver II (shit happens when you are always last pick :/). Anyhow, I remember Bronze in S3 when I first started playing ranked, and I can honestly say some crazy stuff happens in Silver that I have never seen in other ELOs. 

Recently I have been getting teammates that go "full r%%%%%" (which we all know you should never do) and force fights in the worst imaginable places. When the game ends and they have 10, 15, even 20 deaths and I have ~5 I am told "I did nothing all game because I didn't fight with them". Apparently making terrible plays and feeding the other team = carrying your team on your back in Silver logic.
